messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Ding-ding! Watch out, you!
Or, did you want to battle?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Despite all the effort, I’m just spinning
my wheels...It’s always that way with me!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I might try racing through Cycling
Road in one long shot.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
There you are!I’ve been riding in this spot so I’d
get a rematch with you!
